Quickstride nodds his head in compliance to Lord Elder and rears up on his =
hind hooves.

"Yes Sir! QUICKSTRIDE, MAXIMIZE!"

Within moments he transfor=
ms into his robot mode and runs off in the directon of the shuttle.  Even o=
n two feet he proves swift and wastes no time in getting to his destination=
.

At the fortress, Rat Trap re establishes his connection to Lord Elder.

=
"Sorry, ran inta interference, I'm back online Lord Elder. I'm about a quar=
ter of the way through the base's pipe system.  But those uglies ain't givn=
' up on me.  I gotta do somethn' ta distract 'em...  Now let's see....  If =
I was these guys what would I be worried about?  Hmmm, well, defenses for t=
he most part, and then any circuitry related ta power, computer systems....=
  That's it.  I bet if I can find a few electrical ports I might be able ta=
 pull some plugs here 'n there.."

He uses his nose to smell for a faint el=
ectrical smell.  He catches it and crawls into an area where he finds a few=
 fine wires.  They're live, as he senses.

"Paydirt.  Okaaay uglies, now th=
is is where I be getting my sweet revenge.  I dunno what does what, but I b=
et if I cut one of these, or a few, I'll find out." 

With his buck teeth, =
he nibbles at a few wires, and manages to snap several.  He waits to see wh=
at happens.

Torture Chamber...

Tucson did not say a word.  Yet his expres=
sion says many.  His optics narrowed sharply at Darkhawk's statement, this =
would yet be another power surge, due to a shortness in temper, which often=
 was the case because he had not always expressed his anger and kept it in,=
 most of the time.  He was also fed up with Scorponok's obnoxious behavour =
as well.  He balls up one fist, and manages to get some power into his all =
wheel drive system to create another power grip on his hand, thus expanding=
 his wrist and putting strain on his restraints.  It gets to the point wher=
e hydraulic pressure units within his arms, finally swell to the point wher=
e the restraint on the left hand is broken off his arm.  with that, he now =
gives himself a free hand and without another word, he manages to give Dark=
hawk a very nasty blow to his jaw with a loud smack.  

" You just don't kn=
ow when to shut up do you?!"

Anger.  Anger was one of the things Tucson ha=
d wished he never had to show but now was forced into his current mood by D=
arkhawk and Scorponok, yet most of his anger he concentrates into his binds=
 on the torture device, one hand and one leg at a time, concentrating the a=
ll wheel drive power into these areas, which conserves needed energy for th=
e rest of the body.  

" Nothing will make me fold to either one of you.  A=
nd yes, I'm not done fighting yet if that's what you two think. So before y=
ou make snap judgements of me, I caution you two to not judge a bot by his =
frame."  

His backup energy supply kicks in giving him just enough energy =
to transform into SUV mode.  He starts up his engine and waits for his enem=
ie's reaction.







--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <super=
cyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> OOC: Actually that was Scourge's blast - but cool =
:)
> 
> > He starts to send Lord Elder the data relating to his position an=
d location.
> >
> > "Sorry, I had ta yell because of the sound of the energ=
y blasts. Okay, here's the skinny sir, we got three trapped Autobots. Night=
 Light who's unconcious, my new pal, Tucson, who came here tryn' ta save Ro=
dimus's life, even though that lousey heap of scrap doesn't deserve it for =
the treachery he's committed lately and yeah I am reffern' ta Rodimus Prime=
. ACK! Lousey no good GLITCH! Look, I'll tell ya more when I can get outa h=
ere, that's if I get outa here."
> >
> > His transmission breaks after his =
last word.
> 
> "Rat Trap!" He depresses a control upping the transmission =
power
> slightly, "Rat Trap, come in!"
> 
> Lord Elder looked over at Quick=
stride for a moment, his optics
> thoughtful, "Yes of course" he said in a =
somewhat distracted manner.
> He looked back at the display screens as the =
alert from Legacy also
> played over his communication channels as well . .=
 .
> 
> "We are under attack! PREPARE"
> 
> "Blast!" Lord Elder said as he =
oriented sensors in the direction of
> the Old Maximal Base, "The Maximal b=
ase is under attack!" he said. Not
> that he had seen any actually firepowe=
r exchanged, but he knew how
> Minions were.
> 
> He glanced back at the co=
mputer screen, a pensive look on his face.
> "God!' he said. "The Predacons=
 are not taking advantage of this
> distraction to attack. Perhaps they hav=
e problems of their with Rat
> trap there."
> 
> "Quickstride, go get the s=
huttle prepped for launch. We don't have the
> numbers to fully attack the =
Dark Fortress, but maybe we can provide
> enough of a distraction so Rat Tr=
ap can escape, and maybe even rescue
> this Tuscon that Rat trap spoke of."=

> 
> Even as he spoke, Lord Elder was working to bring the Ark's defenses
=
> online. There had been a shield here, and he and legacy had been
> workin=
g to get it in place before all this happened. Now would be the
> time to p=
ut it through it's tests.
>
